author: jgm
content:
The endpoint must return as much data as possible: if it usrs a full execution payload for is proposal it must return it.

In normal situation it will fetch a local payload from its execution client and a remote payload header from its MEV relay, and build a proposal based on whichever is worth more.  

It would return the local execution payload regardless of the value of the relay payload header if the lighthouse circuit breaker says to use a local payload, or if the execution client says the same.
